Name: Bronze
Action: Unwanted co-star (you can insert yourself into an opponent's performance and create as much disturbance as you like so long as you don't make any physical contact).

Name: Bronze
Action: Skip to the tile of choice (On any given turn, instead of rolling the dice, you can move your pawn to any tile on the board)

Name: Bronze
Action: Targeted customization (you can design a customized card for a specific player and assign it to them the next time they perform.)

Name: Bronze
Action: The Heckler (During an opponents turn, you can make as much noise as you'd like without moving.)

Name: Bronze
Action: Assign a prop (pick a portable object of your choice that your opponent HAS TO integrate into their performance)

Name: Bronze
Action: Second guess (after everyone has submitted their guess, the performer must tell you if your guess was correct or not. If not, then you can submit another guess.)

Name: Silver
Action: Encore (if you are not satisfied with the other players' guesses at the end of your performance, you can repeat your performance to help them improve their guesses).

Name: Silver
Action: Shield (render an opponent bonus card obsolete if they try to apply it to you.)

Name: Silver
Action: All play advantage (in the next all play round, take 1 minute to prep your performance before the other team gets to see the prompt).

Name: Silver
Action: Sneak Peak (at the end of your performance and before guesses have been submitted, reveal a character trait)

Name: Silver
Action: Take that! (make an opponent who landed on a easy or medium tile do a difficult character prompt).

Name: Silver
Action: Double points (pick any round round, whether as a guesser or performer, and announce you will double your final tally for the round. This must be done after a performance but before guesses are revealed).

Name: Silver
Action: Blind The actor (make the performer wear a blindfold for the duration of their performance)

Name: Silver
Action: Podcast mode (Limit the performance to an oral performance only.)

Name: Silver
Action: Remove The Situation On Difficult Card

Name: Gold
Action: Right Back At Ya (deflect an opponent's offensive bonus card and make it apply to them instead)

Name: Gold
Action: Break it up (Perform your prompt trait by trait)

Name: Gold
Action: Curse of the blind (Make all the other guessers close their eyes during a performance to make it harder for them to guess
